description: A dashboard for use with the Mattermost MSTeams plugin.

panels.description: The total number of Mattermost users who received at least one chat notification in the past 7 days.
panels.title: Active Users

panels.description: The total number of Mattermost users connected to MS Teams users.
panels.title: Connected Users

panels.description: The total number of Mattermost users invited to connect with MS Teams.
panels.title: Invited Users

panels.description: The maximum number of pending connection invites.
panels.title: Invites Limit

panels.description: The total number of Mattermost users authorized to connect at any time.
panels.title: Whitelisted Users

panels.description: The maximum number of Mattermost users allowed to connect to MS Teams.
panels.title: Max Connected

panels.description: When the application client secret expires.
panels.title: Client Secret Expiry

MS Graph Client Requests by Count (Errors Only)

panels.description: The number of events currently in the change event queue and awaiting processing by an available goroutine, as well as the number of events rejected because the queue was full.
panels.title: Change Event Queue
Top 10 Plugin API Requests by Count

list.description: The namespace (installation ID) by which to filter the graphs.
list.label: Namespace
list.name: namespace

list.description: The Prometheus data source from which to query.

title: MS Teams (By Instance), 1-way sync
